Requirements You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand.

Your movements with two weapons are so swift and disorienting that they befuddle your opponent.

When using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Twin Feint], if both your Strikes deal damage to a targeted creature, the target must succeed at a Will saving throw against your class DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} until the end of your next turn.
